import React from 'react' import Image from '../images/library.jpg' import Module from './modules' const Sidebar = () => { const w3_open = () => { document.getElementById("main").style.marginLeft = "25%"; document.getElementById("mySidebar").style.width = "25%"; document.getElementById("mySidebar").style.display = "block"; document.getElementById("openNav").style.display = 'none'; } const w3_close = () => { document.getElementById("main").style.marginLeft = "0%"; document.getElementById("mySidebar").style.display = "none"; document.getElementById("openNav").style.display = "inline-block"; } return ( <>

Library Management System

) } export default Sidebar
